titleStmt.title: Ta ano the things above proved to be the most proper objects of the mind and affections, in a sermon preached before the University in Great St. Maries Church in Cambridge / by Robert Neville.
titleStmt.author: Neville, Robert, 1640 or 1-1694.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.R. for Benjamin Billingsly,
